import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; const App = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState('5444') const handleButtonClick = (value)=>{ if(value === 'C'){ setInput('') } else if(value == '<'){ setInput(input.slice(0, -1)) } else{ setInput(value) } } return (

{input}

) } export default App
